mapper.select: SELECT user.UserId AS userid, user.UserName AS username, user.CreditsCore AS creditscore , user.UserInputDate AS userlogintime, count(productslog.UserId) AS browseCount, sum(productslog.IsShop)/count(productslog.UserId) AS ratio FROM user INNER JOIN userlog ON (user.UserId=userlog.UserId) INNER JOIN productslog ON (user.UserId=productslog.UserId) GROUP BY productslog.UserId;
